elements.name: As a Po Curator, I can Edit organization name

steps.name: I know which organization I want to edit
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for an organization and found the one I wish to edit
I have selected the function Edit Organization
I am on the edit organization information screen
I change the name of the organization I wish to edit
I set the organization status to either Pending or Active
the system should change the organization name in the organization record to the new name
my name should be listed as last update with the current date and time
the organization status should be Pending or Active as indicated
